subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|カキノキ}} {{wp|Persimmon}} [[Image:Kaki2.jpg|thumb]]
{{ja-kanjitab|かき|yomi=k}} {{IPAfont|/kakayaki/}} → *{{IPAchar|/kakyaki/}} → *{{IPAchar|/kakaki/}} → *{{IPAchar|/kakki/}} → {{IPAchar|/kaki/}} Thought to be derived from {{m|ja|輝き|tr=kakayaki}}, the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of {{w|Early Modern Japanese}} verb {{m|ja|輝く|tr=kakayaku||to [[shine]] [[dazzle|dazzingly]]|pos=obsolete}}, modern ''kagayaku''. {{rfv-etymology|ja|sort=かき}}
